ISecurityParameters

ISecurityParameters
SSLSecurityParameters
TLSSecurityParameters

ISecurityParameters

This class encapsulates all the security parameters that get negotiated during the TLS handshake.  It also holds all the key derivation methods.  Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.
